```{r MVN test}
mu <- c(-1,1,-2,2)
Sigma <- rbind(c(1,0.5,0,0),c(0.5,1,0.5,0),c(0,0.5,1,0.5),c(0,0,0.5,1))

N <- 100000

x <- rand_MVN(mu,Sigma,N)

mu_hat <- rowMeans(x)
Sigma_hat <- cov(t(x))
Sigma_hat
```
